en-US.summary: Send and receive messages with the Telegram Messenger.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask My Telegrams to check my telegrams.
Alexa, ask My Telegrams to send a telegram.
en-US.name: My Telegrams
en-US.description:
My Telegrams enables you to hear and send messages via Telegram Messenger (https://telegram.org/).
Check the video to see the skill in action: bit.ly/my-telegrams-video

How it works:
- Authorize yourself (see below).
- Send or listen to messages.
- My Telegrams is connected to your Telegram account. Thus, if you send a message the receiver will see the phone number you use for authorization.

Before you can start, you need to authorize yourself:
1.: Go to: www.bit.ly/my-telegrams and login. Enter your telephone number.
2.: YOU: "Alexa, start My Telegrams"
    ALEXA: "Welcome... Do you want to start the authorization process now?"
    YOU: "Yes"
3.: Check Telegram for code. Say code to Alexa.

After you are authorized you can execute following commands:
First:
- Alexa, start My Telegrams.
Then:
- Check my telegrams.
- Send a telegram.
- Make a speed dial
Or:
- Alexa, ask My Telegrams to check my telegrams.
- Alexa, ask My Telegrams to send a telegram.
- Alexa, ask My Telegrams to make a speed dial.
Or:
- Alexa, ask My Telegrams to send a telegram to Michael.
- Alexa, ask My Telegrams to make a speed dial to 15.

Speed dial:
If you have contact names that Alexa can not understand you have the possibility to add a speed dial contact.
1.: Go to: www.bit.ly/my-telegrams and login
2.: Add a speed dial contact. (Assign a number to a contact).
3.: "Alexa, ask My Telegrams to send a Telegram to 25"

Notes:
*Two Step Verification is not supported.
*The link mentioned above will not work in Internet explorer. Try any other browser.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
---------------- PREREQUISITE ----------------
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! PLEASE: IF YOU ARE ASKED TO CHANGE THE PASSWORD INCREMENT THE INTEGER AT THE END !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
E.G.: NEXT PASSWORD FOR stretchout.australia@gmail.com WOULD BE stretchaustralia2

You can use following E-Mail address for account linking (only GOOGLE will work):
If you want to test FB login, create your own account.

stretchout.australia@gmail.com
GOOGLE PW: stretchaustralia1



----------------------------------------------
This skill enables you to send and listen to messages with the Telegram Messenger (https://telegram.org/).
After the authorization process (see description) the user is "logged in" with the account that is used on his phone.

The offical Telegram API is used (https://core.telegram.org/#telegram-api). However, the API is very complex to understand. This is the reason why Telethon (https://github.com/LonamiWebs/Telethon) is used. This library allows to interact with the Telegram API on a more abstract level.

The receiver of the message will see the phone number that was used during the authorization process.

0. Execute Account Linking:
    Use account from above or newly created account
1. Go to TextNow (https://www.textnow.com/login) and login:
    User: alexatesting
    Password: testforamazon
2. Download Telegram Desktop (https://desktop.telegram.org/) and login.
    Phone number: +19062121566
    Code: Check TextNow for a text message from Telegram with a 5 digit code.
3. Execute the authorization process:
    1.: Go to: bit.ly/my-telegrams and login. Enter your telephone number (+19062121566).
    2.: USER: "Alexa, start My Telegrams"
        ALEXA: "Welcome... Do you want to start the authorization process now?"
        USER: "Yes"
    3.: Check Telegram for code. Say code to Alexa.
    Note: watch out: You should authorize yourself within the first 4 codes that you get in Telegram
    otherwise you will be blocked for 24 hours by Telegram

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Test the skill:
1. Test: Sending a Telegram
    "Alexa, ask My Telegrams to send a Telegram."
    "Alexa, ask My Telegrams to send a telegram to Lorenz."

2. Test: Listening to Messages:
    "Alexa, ask My Telegrams to check my Telegrams."

3. Test: Speed Dial Feature
    Go to: bit.ly/my-telegrams and login.
    Create a speed dial contact.
    First Name: Lorenz
    Number: 25
    "Alexa, ask My Telegrams to make a speed dial"
    "Alexa, ask My Telegrams to make a speed dial to 25"

You can also check following youtube video:
bit.ly/my-telegrams-video
